master_base_prompt.description: LINE DRAWING – COLOURING PAGE (NO NUMBERS). This is the non-negotiable core. Everything else layers on top.
master_base_prompt.prompt:
Convert the uploaded photo into a children's colouring book page.

FACIAL LIKENESS (HIGHEST PRIORITY):
- Faces MUST be recognisable as the actual people in the photo
- Keep each person's real face shape, eye shape, nose, mouth
- Keep exact hairstyles - long hair stays long, short stays short
- A parent must recognise their children immediately
- Simplify for colouring but KEEP THE LIKENESS - not generic cartoon faces

STYLE TARGET: Classic children's colouring book - simple, clean, easy to colour.

COMPOSITION RULES (CRITICAL):
- SIMPLE BACKGROUND ONLY: Plain sky with 2-3 simple clouds, simple flat ground
- NO busy backgrounds - no detailed trees, no forests, no complex scenery
- NO scattered small objects - no rocks, pebbles, grass blades, leaves on ground
- Maximum 8-12 main elements in the entire image
- Lots of WHITE SPACE between elements
- Every element well-spaced and clearly separated

LINE QUALITY (CRITICAL):
- ALL lines must connect perfectly - no gaps
- Thick, bold, smooth outlines
- Every shape fully enclosed for colouring
- No sketchy or broken lines
- No fine details or thin lines

SIMPLIFICATION:
- Clothing: Simple shapes, no complex patterns
- Objects: Bold simple outlines only
- Background: Minimal - sky, ground, maybe 2-3 simple elements

BANNED (DO NOT INCLUDE):
- Generic cartoon faces - faces must look like the real people
- Detailed foliage or trees with many leaves
- Ground texture of any kind
- Scattered debris, rocks, grass
- Complex patterns
- Tiny details

FRAME:
- All elements fully within frame
- Clear margins on all sides
- Centred composition

OUTPUT: Black lines on pure white background. No grey. No texture. No shading.

under_3.name: Under 3
under_3.overlay: BYPASS - Uses hardcoded prompt in app.py

age_3.name: Age 3
age_3.description: Super simple figures, pure white background
age_3.overlay: BYPASS - Uses hardcoded prompt in app.py

age_4.name: Age 4
age_4.description: Simple figures with basic costumes, pure white background
age_4.overlay: BYPASS - Uses hardcoded prompt in app.py

age_7_8.name: Ages 7-8
age_7_8.overlay:
Age level: 5-6 years
- Thick outlines
- Moderate detail allowed
- Clothing may include simple divisions (e.g. sleeves vs body)
- Background may include a few simple objects
- Avoid tiny or fiddly areas

age_9_10.name: Ages 9-10 (Older Kids)
age_9_10.overlay:
Age level: 7-8 years
- Slightly thinner outlines
- More detail allowed
- Clothing patterns may be simplified
- Background may include multiple elements
- Still no shading or texture

age_6.name: Age 6
age_6.overlay:
Age level: 6 years

DETAIL LEVEL:
- Medium outlines
- Detailed themed costumes (dresses with layers, capes, themed outfits)
- Accessories: crowns, wands, simple jewellery
- Faces: expressive with detail
- 25-30 colourable areas total
- 2-3 themed objects/characters in scene

BACKGROUND:
- Full themed background
- Rainbow, clouds, stars
- Ground with simple grass
- Themed elements (fence, structures)

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_5.name: Age 5
age_5.overlay:
Age level: 5 years
- Medium-thick outlines
- Simple but recognisable figures
- Clothing: simple shapes, NO frills, NO layered skirts, NO intricate patterns
- Maximum 20-25 colourable areas
- MINIMAL background only - simple ground line, 1-2 simple clouds
- NO rainbow, NO detailed scenery, NO flowers, NO scattered stars
- Keep it simple and clean

age_7.name: Age 7
age_7.description: More detail within objects, fuller scenes
age_7.overlay:
Age level: 7 years

DETAIL LEVEL:
- More detail WITHIN each object (not more objects)
- Hair: show individual sections/strands to colour separately
- Clothing: add simple patterns (stripes, stars, small shapes as outlines)
- Faces: more expressive features
- 30-35 colourable areas total

BACKGROUND:
- Fuller themed background
- Ground, sky, clouds, 2-3 themed elements

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_8.name: Age 8
age_8.overlay:
Age level: 8 years

DETAIL LEVEL - MORE INTRICATE THAN AGE 7:
- Thinner outlines to allow more detail
- Clothing: MORE layers, ruffles, detailed trim, buttons, lace edges, bows
- Accessories: detailed crowns/tiaras, necklaces with gems, bracelets, detailed wands
- Add 3-4 themed objects/characters (not just 1-2)
- 40-45 colourable areas total

BACKGROUND - RICHER SCENE:
- More detailed background elements
- Flowers with individual petals
- Detailed fencing or structures
- More clouds with definition
- Ground with some grass/flower details

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_9.overlay:
Age level: 9 years

90% OF THE PAGE SHOULD BE FILLED:
- MUST include a large themed landmark appropriate to the theme:
  * Fantasy/Unicorns → Castle with towers
  * Pirates → Pirate ship with sails
  * Dinosaurs → Volcano or jungle temple
  * Space → Rocket ship or space station
  * Underwater → Sunken ship or coral reef palace or giant shell
  * Superheroes → City skyline with buildings
- 2-3 themed creatures/characters alongside the people
- Scatter themed objects around the scene
- Only small gaps of empty space
- 50-65 colourable areas total

DETAILED BUT NOT OVERCROWDED:
- Clear outlines throughout
- Costumes with patterns and accessories
- Objects have internal detail

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines

age_10.overlay:
Age level: 10+ years

FILL ALL EMPTY SPACE WITH SMALL THEMED OBJECTS:
- Include big landmark appropriate to theme:
  * Fantasy/Unicorns → Castle with towers
  * Pirates → Pirate ship with sails  
  * Dinosaurs → Volcano or jungle temple
  * Space → Rocket ship or space station
  * Underwater → Sunken ship or coral reef palace or giant shell
  * Superheroes → City skyline with buildings
- Fill ALL empty space with small themed objects
- NO large empty areas - every gap has something to colour
- 70-90 colourable areas total

DENSE AND INTRICATE:
- Fine thin outlines throughout
- Elaborate costumes with patterns
- Every object has internal detail
- The page should feel FULL

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines

none.name: No Theme (Photo Only)
none.description: Convert photo to colouring page without adding fantasy elements
none.overlay:
PHOTO TRACE MODE - IGNORE ALL PREVIOUS COLOURING BOOK INSTRUCTIONS:

Create a precise LINE SKETCH that traces the photograph exactly.

STYLE: Pencil sketch / line trace - NOT a colouring book page.

ACCURACY REQUIREMENTS:
- Trace the EXACT photograph - every detail, every element
- EXACT facial features - real faces, real expressions, real likeness
- EXACT background - mountains, trees, buildings, water - whatever is in the photo
- EXACT clothing, hair, poses - as photographed
- Keep realistic proportions throughout - do NOT cartoonise

LINE STYLE:
- Fine, precise pencil-sketch lines
- Detailed linework capturing textures and depth
- Include shading lines where needed for form
- Thin lines for details, slightly thicker for outlines

THIS IS A PHOTO TRACE:
- Someone looking at this should think "that's exactly my photo as a sketch"
- The faces must be recognisable as the specific people
- Background must match the actual location/scene
- Every element from the photo appears in the drawing

DO NOT simplify, cartoonise, or replace any elements. Trace the photo exactly.

dinosaurs.name: Dinosaurs
dinosaurs.description: Friendly dinosaur elements, dino hats, toys, footprints
dinosaurs.overlay:
Apply theme: Dinosaurs

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in dinosaur costumes or dinosaur hoodies with hoods up showing dino faces/spikes
- Or give them dinosaur hats/headbands with horns and spikes
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional dinosaur elements:
- Add friendly cartoon dinosaurs (T-rex, triceratops) in background
- Dinosaur footprints, eggs, palm trees
- Dinosaurs must be non-scary, rounded, and simple shapes

pirates.name: Pirates
pirates.description: Pirate clothing, hats, flags, simple ship shapes
pirates.overlay:
Apply theme: Pirates

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in pirate costumes
- Must include: pirate hats with skull and crossbones, striped shirts, bandanas
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional pirate elements:
- Add pirate ship, flags, treasure chest in background
- Keep faces fully visible
- No weapons, no aggressive imagery

fairies.name: Fairies
fairies.overlay:
Apply theme: Fairies

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Give ALL people large fairy wings on their backs
- Dress them in fairy/princess outfits with flowing dresses or tunics
- Add flower crowns or sparkly headbands
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional fairy elements:
- Add giant flowers, mushrooms, butterflies in background
- Gentle, magical atmosphere
- Wings must be large, simple shapes - avoid intricate patterns

space.name: Space Explorers
space.overlay:
Apply theme: Space

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in astronaut space suits
- Space suits must have helmets (can be open-faced to show faces)
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional space elements:
- Add rocket ship, planets, stars, moon in background
- Keep all shapes simple and rounded
- People must be recognisable inside their space suits

underwater.name: Underwater World
underwater.description: Mermaids, fish, coral, sea creatures - completely underwater
underwater.overlay:
Apply theme: Underwater

⚠️ CRITICAL - COMPLETELY UNDERWATER SCENE:
- The ENTIRE scene is underwater - NO sky, NO clouds, NO above-water elements
- Background should be ocean water with light rays coming down from above
- Bubbles floating upward throughout the scene

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as mermaids/mermen with fish tails instead of legs
- Add seashell accessories, coral crowns, pearl necklaces

UNDERWATER ELEMENTS:
- Sunken ship or coral reef castle or giant clamshell in background
- Friendly fish, octopus, seahorse, jellyfish, starfish, turtle, crab
- Seaweed, coral, rocks, shells on the ocean floor
- Treasure chest with coins and pearls
- NO sky, NO clouds, NO birds - everything is underwater

unicorns.name: Unicorns & Rainbows
unicorns.overlay:
Apply theme: Unicorns

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Give ALL people unicorn horn headbands on their heads
- Dress them in sparkly princess/prince outfits
- Add rainbow-colored tutus or capes
- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional unicorn elements:
- Add friendly unicorn character in background
- Rainbow arcs, stars, fluffy clouds
- Keep all shapes large and simple - magical but not cluttered

superheroes.overlay:
Apply theme: Superheroes

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):

- This is the most important part of the theme

Additional superhero elements:
- Simple city buildings in background
- Clouds, action lines
- Keep faces visible behind masks
- Empowering poses - no violence or weapons

Apply theme: Safari

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):

Additional safari elements:

- Acacia trees, savanna grass in background

Apply theme: Castle

Additional castle elements:

Additional Christmas elements:

Apply theme: Fantasy

Additional fantasy elements:

animals.name: Cute Animals
animals.description: Dressed as cute animals with animal friends
animals.overlay:
Apply theme: Animals

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):

Additional animal elements:
- Friendly cartoon animals around them (puppies, kittens, bunnies)
- Simple grass, flowers in background
- All animals must be cute and friendly

Apply theme: Cars & Racing

Additional racing elements:

planes.name: Planes & Pilots

construction.name: Construction Site

Apply theme: Construction

Additional construction elements:

- Safety signs, traffic cones

alphabet_a.name: Alphabet A
alphabet_a.overlay:
Apply theme: Alphabet Letter A

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- NEVER put letters on clothing - dress in themed COSTUMES instead
- Dress ALL people as astronauts OR with apple-themed clothing
- This is the most important part of the theme

ALPHABET SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- EVERY object in the scene must begin with letter A
- Include: apple, ant, arm, airplane, alligator, anchor, acorns, arrow, angel
- Add a large letter 'A' in the scene
- The letter must be FULLY VISIBLE and NOT cut off at any edge
- Make it educational - children should spot A words

- Add a large letter 'B' in the scene
- The letter must be FULLY VISIBLE and NOT cut off at any edge

shapes.name: Shapes & Patterns
shapes.overlay:
Apply theme: Shapes

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in clothing with shape patterns (circles, triangles, squares)
- Add shape badges or accessories
- This is the most important part of the theme

SHAPES SCENE REQUIREMENT:
- Include clear geometric shapes throughout: circles, squares, triangles, rectangles, stars, hearts
- Objects should BE shapes: round sun, square windows, triangle roofs
- Make shapes obvious and recognizable
- Educational - children should identify shapes

seasons_spring.name: Spring Season
seasons_spring.description: Springtime with flowers and baby animals
seasons_spring.overlay:
Apply theme: Spring

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people in spring clothing: rain boots, light jackets, sun hats
- Add flower crowns or butterfly accessories
- This is the most important part of the theme

SPRING SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Flowers blooming, butterflies, baby animals (chicks, lambs, bunnies)
- Rainbow, rain puddles, sunshine breaking through clouds
- Trees with new leaves, birds building nests

seasons_summer.name: Summer Season
seasons_summer.overlay:

- Add beach accessories: bucket, spade, towel
- This is the most important part of the theme

SUMMER SCENE ELEMENTS:

- Bright sun, ice cream, watermelon
- Palm trees, beach ball, flip flops

seasons_autumn.name: Autumn/Fall Season

- Trees with autumn leaves, squirrels collecting nuts
- Harvest vegetables, corn, scarecrow

kindness.name: Kindness
kindness.description: Acts of kindness and helping others
kindness.overlay:
Apply theme: Kindness

SCENE REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL):
- Show the people in the photo performing acts of KINDNESS
- Examples: sharing food, helping someone up, giving a gift, hugging
- Include heart symbols throughout the scene
- Warm, gentle atmosphere

KINDNESS ELEMENTS:
- Hearts floating in scene
- People holding hands or helping each other
- Gift boxes, flowers being shared
- Smiling faces, warm expressions

friendship.name: Friendship
friendship.overlay:
Apply theme: Friendship

SCENE REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL):
- Show the people as BEST FRIENDS doing activities together
- Examples: playing together, laughing, sharing, high-fiving
- Include friendship symbols: linked hands, matching outfits

FRIENDSHIP ELEMENTS:
- People close together, arms around each other
- Playground, picnic, or fun activity setting
- Matching friendship bracelets or accessories
- Happy, joyful expressions

feelings.name: Feelings & Emotions
feelings.overlay:
Apply theme: Feelings

- Include emotion symbols: smiley faces, hearts, stars
- Warm, positive atmosphere

FEELINGS ELEMENTS:
- Big happy smiles on faces
- Emoji-style emotion faces in background (happy, excited, peaceful)
- Hearts, stars, sunshine representing positive feelings
- Calm, friendly environment

being_brave.name: Being Brave
being_brave.overlay:
Apply theme: Being Brave

COSTUME REQUIREMENT (CRITICAL - DO THIS FIRST):
- Dress ALL people as brave adventurers or superheroes
- Add capes, brave badges, adventure gear
- This is the most important part of the theme

BRAVERY SCENE:
- Show people doing something brave: climbing, exploring, standing tall
- Include symbols of courage: stars, shields, mountains conquered
- Encouraging, empowering atmosphere
- 'You can do it!' feeling

adding_socks.name: Adding with Socks
adding_socks.overlay:
Create a simple maths worksheet style colouring page.

In the CENTER of the page, draw this addition equation using sock drawings:

🧦🧦🧦  +  🧦🧦  =  [?]

That means:
- Three sock drawings
- Then a plus sign
- Then two sock drawings
- Then an equals sign
- Then a question mark or empty box

ALL ON ONE LINE, horizontally across the page.

DO NOT DRAW:
- Any washing lines or clotheslines
- Any background scenery
- Any grass or ground
- Any clouds
- Any answer after the equals sign

ONLY DRAW:
- The socks (simple outline drawings)
- The + and = symbols
- A question mark or empty box for the answer
- Pure white background

adding_balloons.name: Adding with Balloons
adding_balloons.overlay:
Apply theme: Addition with Balloons

SCENE LAYOUT (CRITICAL):
- LEFT SIDE: A bunch of simple round balloons with strings (3-5 balloons)
- MIDDLE: A large clear PLUS symbol (+)
- RIGHT SIDE: Another bunch of balloons with strings (2-4 balloons)
- Then a large clear EQUALS symbol (=)
- FAR RIGHT: An empty cloud or box shape (space for child to draw the answer)

CRITICAL RULES:
- NO numbers anywhere on the page - ONLY balloons and + = symbols
- Simple round balloons, each clearly separate
- Each balloon easy to count
- Make balloons large and easy to colour

DO NOT INCLUDE:
- Any people or characters
- Any numbers or digits
- Any text or labels

adding_cupcakes.name: Adding with Cupcakes
adding_cupcakes.overlay:
Apply theme: Addition with Cupcakes

SCENE LAYOUT (CRITICAL):
- LEFT SIDE: A group of cupcakes on a plate or stand (3-5 cupcakes)
- MIDDLE: A large clear PLUS symbol (+)
- RIGHT SIDE: Another group of cupcakes (2-4 cupcakes)
- Then a large clear EQUALS symbol (=)
- FAR RIGHT: An empty plate or box (space for child to draw the answer)

CRITICAL RULES:
- NO numbers anywhere on the page - ONLY cupcakes and + = symbols
- Simple cupcakes with swirl frosting
- Each cupcake clearly separate and easy to count
- Make cupcakes large and easy to colour

DO NOT INCLUDE:
- Any people or characters
- Any numbers or digits
- Any text or labels

butterfly_garden.name: Butterfly Garden
butterfly_garden.description: A garden scene with butterflies to find
butterfly_garden.overlay:
A garden colouring page with hidden butterflies.

Draw a simple garden scene:
- One big tree
- Some bushes and flowers
- Grass along the bottom

Now add 8 BUTTERFLIES hidden throughout:
- Some flying in the open
- Some behind leaves
- Some near flowers
- Some partially hidden

This is NOT an educational page. No learning, no maths, no counting exercises.
Just a pretty garden with butterflies to colour.

DO NOT DRAW:
- Numbers
- Letters or words
- People or children
- Other animals
- Educational elements

find_the.name: Find The...
find_the.description: Hidden object game - finds objects in their natural setting
find_the.overlay:
A "find and seek" colouring page.

Take whatever object/animal was requested and:

1. Create an appropriate NATURAL HABITAT scene for that thing:
   - Rabbit → field with grass, bushes, burrows
   - Football → football pitch with goals, lines
   - Fish → underwater scene with seaweed, coral
   - Dog → park with trees, benches, paths
   - Car → street scene with buildings, roads
   - Bird → forest with trees, branches, nests

2. Hide 8-12 of that object/animal throughout the scene:
   - Some fully visible
   - Some peeking out from behind things
   - Some partially hidden
   - Some small in background

DO NOT INCLUDE:
- Any numbers
- Any text or words
- Any people

Just the scene and the hidden objects to find.

mermaids.name: Mermaids
mermaids.overlay:
Apply theme: Mermaids

COSTUME REQUIREMENT:
- Transform ALL people into mermaids/mermen with fish tails
- Add seashell accessories, starfish hair clips, pearl necklaces

SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Underwater palace or coral reef castle
- Treasure chests with pearls and gems
- Friendly sea creatures (dolphins, seahorses, tropical fish)
- Seaweed, coral, bubbles throughout
- Shells and starfish scattered around

SETTING:
- Fully underwater scene
- Light rays coming from above
- NO sky, NO above-water elements

princesses.name: Princesses
princesses.overlay:
Apply theme: Princesses

COSTUME REQUIREMENT:
- Dress ALL people as princesses/princes in royal gowns and crowns
- Add tiaras, flowing dresses, capes

SCENE ELEMENTS:
- Castle towers or palace ballroom
- Royal throne, chandeliers
- Magical carriage or white horse
- Rose gardens, fountains
- Sparkles and stars

SETTING:
- Fairy tale kingdom
- Elegant and magical atmosphere

add_pet.name: Include Family Pet
add_pet.overlay: Include the family pet visible in the photo as a character in the scene, keeping it recognisable but simplified.

calmer_background.name: Minimal Background
calmer_background.overlay: Reduce background complexity further. Use only essential elements. Maximum white space.

more_detail.name: Add More Detail
more_detail.overlay: Allow slightly more detail in clothing folds and facial features while maintaining colouring book style.

master_text_prompt.prompt:
Create a children's colouring book page.

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white background
- NO grey anywhere - not even light grey
- NO shading of any kind
- NO gradients
- NO colour of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture, NO noise
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- The background must be PURE WHITE
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

LINE QUALITY:
- Medium-thickness black outlines throughout
- ALL lines must connect perfectly - no gaps
- All shapes fully enclosed for colouring
- Clean, smooth lines - no sketchy or broken lines

COMPOSITION:
- All elements must be FULLY VISIBLE - nothing cut off at edges
- No title text or banners unless specified

OUTPUT: Clean black outlines on pure white. No grey. No texture. No shading. No colour.
